document_data.name: Bristol
document_data.mainbody: '''Bristol''' was a child who served aboard the ''[[Marderward]]'' during the midâ€”15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Bristol served under Captain [[Taraf Predeau]], a horrible man who took children into indentured servitude and broke their spirits by pitting them against one another.
document_data.History: Some time during or before the {{YearlinkName|1469}}, Bristol and the other children aboard ''Marderward'' shifted their allegiance from Captain Predeau to a new seaman aboard the ship, [[Harp Levesque]]. Harp helped break the system of abuse that was prevalent aboard the vessel, and led both the children and some of the adult crewman in a mutiny.
